column3: In celebration and calculation do we bring a Heavensturn gift, from the Far East to Eorzea. Long may we be of good blood!
Has <If(PlayerParameter(4))>m'lady<Else/>m'lord</If> perhaps misplaced the gift <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If> was given, that which the giver and the gifted alike call the uma kabuto?
You are a <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> fearless and clueless to lose an item of such import! I shall give you another, but misplace it not again.
